author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make ZDC geometry vary with ERAs. It started with an experimental one and matured to become a concrete one.

#### PR validation:

It fails in tests. Made to share it with Yana

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This works and may be backported to 14_1_X
title: Run3-hcx360 Make ZDC geometry varying with ERAs
